item.title: A quick look at the Elastic Stack
item.description: Elastic Search, Logstash and Kibana This quick post will get you up and running with the elk stack. Please clone my github repository where the scripts I created live and so that you can follow along with the post. Go to Elkstack Practice If you want to generate movies.json then do the following command: go run main.go > movies.json If you want to generate tags.json then do the following command:
